注.definition: to inject; to pour into; to concentrate; to pay attention; stake (gambling); classifier for sums of money; variant of 註|注[zhu4]

注入.definition: to pour into; to empty into

注射針頭.definition: see 注射針|注射针[zhu4 she4 zhen1]

注意.definition: to take note of; to pay attention to

注意力不足過動症.pinyin: zhu4 yi4 li4 bu4 zu2 guo4 dong4 zheng4

注意力缺失症.pinyin: zhu4 yi4 li4 que1 shi1 zheng4

注意力缺陷多動症.pinyin: zhu4 yi4 li4 que1 xian4 duo1 dong4 zheng4

注意力缺陷過動症.pinyin: zhu4 yi4 li4 que1 xian4 guo4 dong4 zheng4

注水.definition: to pour water into; to inject water into

注目.definition: attention; to stare at; to fix attention on sth

注視.definition: to look attentively at; to closely watch; to gaze at

注資.definition: to inject funds; to put money into (the market)

注釋.definition: to annotate; to add a comment; explanatory note; annotation

注重.definition: to pay attention to; to emphasize

注音.definition: to indicate the pronunciation of Chinese characters using Pinyin or Bopomofo etc; phonetic notation; (specifically) Bopomofo (abbr. for 注音符號|注音符号[zhu4 yin1 fu2 hao4])

注音一式.definition: Mandarin Phonetic Symbols 1; Bopomofo; abbr. for 國語注音符號第一式|国语注音符号第一式[Guo2 yu3 zhu4 yin1 fu2 hao4 di4 yi1 shi4]

注音字母.definition: see 注音符號|注音符号[zhu4 yin1 fu2 hao4]

注音符號.definition: Mandarin phonetic symbols (MPS), phonetic alphabet for Chinese used esp. in Taiwan, also known colloquially as Bopomofo (after the first four letters of the alphabet:ㄅㄆㄇㄈ)
